snippet: State’s Attorney Anita Alvarez contends Illinois’s gay marriage ban is unconstitutional and is filing a motion supporting a lawsuit opposing the ban.
abstract: Anita Alvarez, Illinois State Attorney, files a motion supporting a lawsuit that opposes the state's gay marriage ban, contending that it is unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: State’s Attorney Anita Alvarez contends Illinois’s gay marriage ban is unconstitutional and is filing a motion supporting a lawsuit opposing the ban.

headline.main: Illinois: State’s Attorney Opposes Gay Marriage Ban
headline.print_headline: Illinois: State’s Attorney Opposes Gay Marriage Ban

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
